data.name: CommonDataObj_Desc1
data.value: With [CompanyName] Smart Peak Shaving algorithm you would realize an {b} additional saving of €[Price]/month{\b} over the simulated period of one month.

data.name: CommonDataObj_Desc2
data.value: Your [BatteryName] home battery is fully ready for this. When the capacity tariff is effectively introduced, you can register for the Smart Peak Shaving service from [CompanyName] energy.
